Apple quarterly profit, revenue top Wall Street targets but China lagsApple on Thursday reported sales and profit that beat Wall Street estimates, powered by growth in its iPhone business. But China sales missed analysts' targets. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 21:30:41 GMT EW4XPZ5BDNOVFBO47XHRLM3NPI https://www.reuters.com/technology/apple-quarterly-profit-revenue-top-wall-street-targets-china-layers-2024-02-01/Stephen Nellis技术
Algeria pushes UN Security Council to demand Gaza ceasefireAlgeria has drafted a U.N. Security Council resolution to demand an immediate humanitarian ceasefire between Israel and Hamas, a move that the United States - a council veto power - opposes because it says it would only benefit the Palestinian militants. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 20:38:02 GMT RULEX6HHWRK6NZYK3OIPWOB7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/algeria-pushes-a-security-council-demand-for-gaza-ceasefire-2024-02-01/Michelle Nichols世界非洲
Tesla opens first South America store in Chilean capitalTesla opened its first South American store this week, displaying its sleek electric vehicles (EVs) at an upscale mall in Chile's capital Santiago, as the automaker grapples with a slowdown in EV demand and the growth of Chinese rivals. Saudi Arabia has not yet joined BRICS - Saudi official sourceSaudi Arabia is still considering an invitation to become a member of the BRICS bloc of countries after being asked to join by the group last year, a Saudi official source told Reuters. Russia has no plans to deploy nuclear arms beyond Belarus, says deputy ministerRussia will not deploy nuclear weapons abroad except in its ally Belarus but will find ways to counter any deployment of U.S. tactical nuclear weapons in Britain, the deputy minister in charge of arms control said on Thursday. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 16:01:34 GMT C7O2GLZFYZN6FBBA66WELYNREU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-has-no-plans-to-deploy-nuclear-arms-beyond-belarus-says-deputy-minister-2024-02-01/Dmitry Antonov, Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
Europe gains powers to tackle supply chain emergenciesEU countries and lawmakers on Thursday agreed to rules which will require Europe-based companies to prioritise production of key products to prevent a supply chain crisis such as that prompted by the COVID-19 pandemic and Russia's Ukraine invasion. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 13:15:50 GMT WKWBLCDTT5MUTGKK2XR2EY6434 https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/europe-gains-powers-tackle-supply-chain-emergcies-2024-02-01/Foo Yun Chee市场欧洲市场
India to keep spending on border roads after 30% budget overrun on China fearsIndia's government will maintain increased funding to build roads near its China border after spending 30% more on them this fiscal year than planned, it said on Thursday, citing tension between the two nuclear-armed neighbours. Canada Goose rides on China luxury demand recovery to forecast strong quarterCanada Goose Holdings , forecast fourth-quarter revenue above analysts' estimates on Thursday, as the luxury goods maker bets on a sharp rebound in crucial market China to help ride out a slowdown in the U.S. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 11:55:27 GMT NIZYLICU5FODPLB7BDBB5TUJ2Y https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/canada-goose-misses-quarterly-revenue-expectations-2024-02-01/Aatrayee Chatterjee, Ananya Mariam Rajesh商业零售与消费品
Paytm: from humble facilitator to embattled fintech giantOne of India's most popular payments companies, Paytm , is facing its biggest crisis after the country's central bank ordered its banking unit to stop accepting fresh deposits from March, leading to sharp fall in its shares. Exclusive: China tells Ukraine to remove its firms from 'sponsors of war' listChina demanded on Thursday that Ukraine immediately remove more than a dozen Chinese companies from a list of firms designated as "international sponsors of war", saying it wanted Kyiv to "eliminate negative impacts".
